span.span: in accordance with Governor Reynold's recommendation. Facility use, including the fitness center, by the community is restricted. We will have essential staff only in the building. If you need something in the building, please contact Mr. Glackin.

br.span: Beginning March 19, we will be offering a meal for pick up for any student in need. The meal is free of charge. If you would like your child to have a meal prepared, please notify Mr. Glackin:

Pick up time: 11 am to 12:30 pm.
We have some resources available for meal delivery. You are encouraged to talk to Mr. Glackin if this is a need.

div.p:
With the realization that all students can learn, our school will strive to teach our students the intellectual, physical, creative, emotional, and social skills necessary for productive citizenship
Woodbury Central Contact Information
Phone : (712) 873-3128
Fax: (712) 873-3162

h2.style: font-size: 23px; font-family: asapbold; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(16, 10, 59); padding: 0px 0px 4px; margin: 20px 0px 15px;

div.span:
It is the policy of the Woodbury Central Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact Doug Glackin at 408 S. 4th Street, Moville, IA, phone: 712-873-3128, dglackin@wcwildcats.org.
The Woodbury Central web page is created, maintained, and edited by students. Please be patient as the site is currently under construction.

div.h2:
School Closure Information:
Building and Grounds Committee Meeting:
April 20, 6:30 pm in HS Library

h2.style: border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(16, 10, 59); font-family: asapbold; padding: 0px 0px 4px; font-size: 23px; margin: 20px 0px 15px;

div.h2: Serving Lunches from 11 am to 12:30 pm

p.span:
Please contact Mr. Glackin at dglackin@wcwildcats.org or 712-873-3128 if you would like to pick up a lunch for your child.
You will pick up a lunch for that day and a breakfast for the next.
